fact.description: The match is underway in Porto Alegre.
Argentina's Angel Di Maria gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Argentina take a 0-1 lead thanks to Lionel Messi.
Great play from Michael Babatunde to set up the goal.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Argentina push forward through Angel Di Maria, whose finish on goal is saved.
Argentina are pushing forward but Gonzalo Higuain's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Throw-in Nigeria.
Free kick Argentina.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Argentina.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Nigeria throw-in in Argentina's half.
Ogenyi Eddy Onazi (Nigeria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Juwon Oshaniwa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Play has been resumed.
Juwon Oshaniwa is back on his feet again.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
In Porto Alegre Argentina attack through Angel Di Maria. The finish is off target, however.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Throw-in for Nigeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Peter Odemwingie of Nigeria gets in a strike, but is off target.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Porto Alegre Argentina drive forward through Angel Di Maria. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Nigeria throw-in in Argentina's half.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Argentina push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Sergio Aguero gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nigeria defence.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Can Nigeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Sergio Aguero, who is grimacing with pain.
Alejandro Sabella (Argentina) is making a first change, with Ezequiel Lavezzi replacing the possibly injured Sergio Aguero.
Play has been resumed at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Nigeria are coming forward and Joseph Yobo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Federico Fernandez (Argentina) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Nigeria defenders.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Throw-in for Nigeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Argentina have a dangerous throw-in.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ogenyi Eddy Onazi, who is down injured.
Ogenyi Eddy Onazi is back on the pitch.
Play is underway once more.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Lionel Messi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Argentina.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Free kick Argentina.
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Lionel Messi gives Argentina a 1-2 lead in Porto Alegre.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Emmanuel Emenike instrumental with a fine assist.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Kenneth Omeruo (Nigeria) has received a first yellow card.
Argentina drive forward and Angel Di Maria gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Ezequiel Garay with an assist there.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Nigeria's Juwon Oshaniwa has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Argentina.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gonzalo Higuain of Argentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli blows against Argentina's Lionel Messi for offside.
Throw-in for Nigeria in their own half.
Free kick Argentina.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Argentina's Lionel Messi misses with an attempt on goal.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Nigeria's Peter Odemwingie is on target but unsuccessful.
Juwon Oshaniwa (Nigeria) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ricardo Alvarez is replacing Lionel Messi for Argentina at Estadio Beira-Rio.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Michael Babatunde.
Play has been resumed.
Michael Babatunde (Nigeria) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Michael Uchebo.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Throw-in for Nigeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick Argentina.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Nigeria throw-in in Argentina's half.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Throw-in Argentina.
Nigeria’s Emmanuel Emenike is on his feet again at Estadio Beira-Rio.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio is underway again.
Attention is being given to Nigeria’s Emmanuel Emenike and play has been suspended briefly.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Ahmed Musa of Nigeria gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Nigeria drive forward but Emmanuel Emenike is judged offside.
Free kick Argentina.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a throw-in for Argentina, close to Nigeria's area.
Ezequiel Lavezzi for Argentina drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Porto Alegre, Ahmed Musa of Nigeria is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Argentina's Ezequiel Garay attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
Stephen Keshi is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Uche Nwofor replacing Peter Odemwingie.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Argentina needs to be cautious. Nigeria have an attacking throw-in.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Can Nigeria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Argentina's half?
Emmanuel Emenike for Nigeria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Argentina drive forward and Angel Di Maria gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Nigeria drive upfield and Efe Eric Ambrose gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Argentina defender.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Argentina push forward through Javier Mascherano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lucas Biglia is on a sub for Gonzalo Higuain for Argentina.
Juwon Oshaniwa is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Juwon Oshaniwa for Nigeria is back on the field again.
4 minutes will be added to the second half.
Nicola Rizzoli has blown to resume play in Porto Alegre.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Nigeria in their own half.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Argentina are in shooting range from this free kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-3.
